bug.author: ThrashAbaddon
bug.summary: Segfault when loading Open DRIVE maps
bug.description:
Hello, I've stumbled on two segfaults that happen when loading maps
Ex_Simple-LaneOffset.zip UC_Simple-X-Junction-TrafficLights.zip
I'm not sure are the bugs related but what I know is that Map::CreateRtree crashes on Ex_Simple-LaneOffset. I'm using: CARLA 0.9.9 Wndows 10 64bit.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marcgpuig>@marcgpuig</denchmark-link> master of environments, could you look at this?
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
